replies.replyComment: Ratatama kela wenawa gotabaya awoth meka balanna sahodaraya üòêüòêüòêhttps://youtu.be/gKy2qGk7s0o
@Dayan Hamine onna oyage saba swarupaya eliyata awa. Pahath widihata hasirena oyalata koheda ape minissu gana dukak adarayak
@Dayan Hamine ane oyala wage minissu rtata adarayak na agamata jathiyata adarayak na ranawiruwonta garuthwayak adarayak  na. Katha karala wadakuth na. Budu saranai.
@Dayan Hamine mage ammawath mage paule kauruth deshadrohiyo wune nane maranna. Deshadrohiyonta thama rate athithe amathaka
@Dayan Hamine me rata loke darunu thasthawadayakin godak windewwa kiyala amathaka wela anda mnda wela inne kauda. Dan thawa ekak anthawadin. Thawath innawa ai koi wele marenna weida danne na.
@Dayan Hamine lasantha thama oyage loke weeraya nathuwa jeewath wenna rata dunna aya nemei. üëç

@Dayan Hamine hamudawe yudden marichcha kollo ganath kaths karannako e wagema. Lasantha rata beragaththe nane. Oya jeewath wena rata ada thiyenne  hamudawe kollo nisa. Oyatai athithayak amathaka. Comment dala thiyenne unp gottawal eka therenne nadda. Lasanthawa allan inna oyage nayek wenna athine rata beragaththa widiha amathaka karanna

@Dayan Hamine anika fonseka kiyanne kauda kiyala thama theril nadda. Yuddedi karapu sewayata garu karanawa ethumata eth yudden passe sudu kodi kathawen ratai ranawiruwoi pawa dunna. Tika dawasakata kalin sajithta banna gotabayata honda kiwwa ewa ahunada. Sajith arakshaka amathi kama denawa kiwwama diwa nauna sajith honda wuna gotabaya naraka wuna. Aththa peddi as arala balala therum ganna

@Dayan Hamine ehenm oyage sakshi idiripath karala waradi karuwanta daduwam denna. Unp ekath balaye aurudu 5k hitiya hora kiyala awa hora kiyala yanawa . Sakshi pennala daduwam dennako marenaknma waradi kiya kiya inna. Bale thibune aurudu 5kma Habai yudde kohomada kiyala hamudawe indala kauru hari oyalageth marunanam therei. Horakam karanwa koi kenath eth ratatath wadak wuna. Dan unp eka horakn kare na wagene kathawa. Maha bankuwe indan gasa kawe. Ethakota ewa horakn nemeida. Deshapalanaya kiyanne mokakda kiyala therum ganna balaya labunama mokakda wenne kiyala therum ganna. Eka deshapalaneta ena katath podui.  Eth rata rakagena agama dahama rakaganna eka apita godak wadagath sinhalayata wena ratawal na thiyenne meka witharai .
@Dayan Hamine godak minissunta amathakai kare yuddayak sama sakachchawak neme kiyala. Loke darunuma thrasthawadi kandayamak ekka.
Hamudawata nayakathwaya denne hamudapathi thsmai ekai kiwwe oyalata notherunata üòÇüòÇ . Ane mnda me minissu
